acct.description: The account that owns or is associated with the file.

acct:site.description: The site or service associated with the account.

acct:user.description: The unique identifier for the account.

file.description: The file owned by or associated with the account.

name.description: The name of the file owned by or associated with the account.

posted.description: The date and time the file was posted / submitted.

client.description: The source client address used to post or submit the file.

client:ipv4.description: The source IPv4 address used to post or submit the file.

client:ipv6.description: The source IPv6 address used to post or submit the file.
